blogPost.excerpt: AUXPAD is a must have for students taking lectures, professionals in meetings, journalists collecting interviews, and anywhere when you need to put spoken words into written notes. 👉 Try it now for free! https://auxpad.com
blogPost.body: AUXPAD is a must have for students taking lectures, professionals in meetings, journalists collecting interviews, and anywhere when you need to put spoken words into written notes. 👉 Try it now for free! https://auxpad.com
blogPost.title: AUXPAD Notes - Note-taking with Transcription
blogPost.author: Andrew Ding

localize.description: AUXPADは、講義を受けている学生、会議中の専門家、インタビューを受けているジャーナリストなど、話した言葉を文字にする必要がある場合にはどこでも必須のアイテムです。👉 今すぐ無料でお試しください！ https://auxpad.com
localize.tagline: テープ起こしを伴うノートテイク

localize.description: AUXPAD是学生听课、专业人士开会、记者采访以及任何需要将口语变成书面笔记的地方的必备工具。👉现在就免费试用吧！https://auxpad.com
AUXPAD是學生聽課、專業人士開會、記者採訪以及任何需要將口語變成書面筆記的地方的必備工具。👉現在就免費試用吧！https://auxpad.com
